name: final-project-arknights
description: 1. Haodong Lyu lyu.haod@northeastern.edu 2. Bo Li li.bo10@northeastern.edu 3. Hanyao Yu yu.hanya@northeastern.edu 4. Ye Wang wang.ye7@northeastern.edu

scripts.install-all: npm --prefix app install && npm --prefix service install
scripts.start-frontend: npm --prefix app run build & npm --prefix app run preview
scripts.start: npm run start-backend & npm run start-frontend-dev
scripts.start-prod: npm run start-frontend && npm run start-backend

author: Haodong Lyu, Bo Li, Ye Wang, Hanyao Yu
